title: The Dead Among Us
description:
We are all born into this world, live our lives, and then die. It's something everyone of us will experience. Although we shouldn't fear death, fearing the dead is a different story. Souls trapped on the wrong side, waiting to be freed, or ready to do damage to those who harmed them on earth. So be aware of the dead among us. 

First, death in Sleepy Hollow
Followed by bedtime blues
Then, the house breaths 
Finally in our featured story, the Day of the Dead 

Do you want to connect with other people who love horror and all things Something Scary? Join our new Discord. Join our Patreon and get members only access to our Discord. Go to Patreon.com/snarled

Thanks to our sponsors!
• To match with a licensed therapist today, go to Talkspace.com. Make sure to use the code SCARY to get $100 off of. your first month and help support the show.
• Follow The Generation Why Podcast on Amazon Music or listen early and ad-free by joining Wondery Plus on Apple Podcasts, or the Wondery app.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
